WorkItem.Description:
i discovered that (in Rawr version 5.0.4) the item filter for world bosses seems to need a small fix. 

the issue being that the upper-tier part of the world bosses list, only has the Sha of Anger listed for it, whereas the lower-tier section that lists Salyis's Warband as a second raid boss, as well. 

oh and, in case it matters, i am not sure if the correct thing to  add to the pattern second for "World Bosses" is "|Salyis's Warband" or if it is "Salyis's Warband|Galleon|Chief Salyis"... i am leaning towards the first, though.

one other thing, i discovered another, separate bug, but due to how unrelated they are, i am gonna make a separate post for it.
WorkItem.Summary: world boss item Filter needs a tweek

Comments.Message: There also seems to be something wrong with the Heroic Heart of Fear filter, though I don't know what. Deselecting the filter does not remove Heroic Heart of Fear drops from the upgrade list.
